Moved over to General Add-on Affairs, the place for all your mod-related questions.

MJ tries to land vessels pointed retrograde, is there a chance that the part from which the vessel is being controlled is pointing the wrong way?

Regarding OpenGL, does the -force-opengl switch not work on Win8?

Moved over to General Add-on Affairs, the place for all your mod-related questions.

MJ tries to land vessels pointed retrograde, is there a chance that the part from which the vessel is being controlled is pointing the wrong way?

Regarding OpenGL, does the -force-opengl switch not work on Win8?

MJ should crash your ship in the ground with the cockpit up as long as the controling part points the right way.

And -force-opengl works fine on Win 8 and 10. Make sure you have an updated driver
